title: CZKushan
author: CZKushan
created_time: July 08, 2023, 02:47:08 PMLast edit: July 08, 2023, 03:16:32 PM by CZKushan
content: Recently my old account got banned. I realized it was due to my mistakes. I apologize for them. I have learned from this experience and promise not to repeat those mistakes. I want to know In my old account I had earned some Merit through my postings and now I would like to inquire if it is possible to transfer my sMerit to my new account. Is it legitimate if I proceed with this?  I would greatly appreciate idea from the staff or any old members with experience in this matter.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: No you can't send merits from an account that has been banned.This is interesting, you have just admitted to be evading a ban which means in no time this your account will also be banned. Once an account of an user has been banned it is expected of the user to not return back to the forum again but if he or she wants to continue using the forum then they should create a ban appeal thread in meta with an alt creating another thread is considered as evading a ban...Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM25. Ban evasion (using or creating accounts while one of your accounts is banned) is not allowed.[e]

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: NO. Any banned account is band from doing anything in the Forum, merit sending is not excluded.From posting, editing off profile, and every other thing can't be done with the account, online login and log out access is what the user can be able to do with the account.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: CZKushan on July 08, 2023, 02:47:08 PMIn my old account I had earned some Merit through my postings and now I would like to inquire if it is possible to transfer my sMerit to my new account. Is it legitimate if I proceed with this?You still can't send merits to your another account if the account isn't banned yet. It's against forum rules. And you said your previous account is banned. That means you have done something extreme of rules violation. Youhad to read forum rules and maintain them with full priority. And as you are banned your new account will also be banned as for Ban Evasion. Anyway you can apply in Meta Board but the chances are too low to recover.It's a good learning for new users who is trying to send merits to their other accounts or violating forum rules. So be loyal and be safe.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: out of curiosity, what's the name of your account that got banned? also, can't you test this out? I mean you are the one who has a banned account. also, I don't really think it is possible, for one, you need to be able to view the posts in order to give merit and from what I remember when my account was temporarily banned some years ago, you can't visit boards or read threads when your account is temporarily banned.
